short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast forwards through ads on binge.com.au

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your video-watching experience on Binge (binge.com.au) with the Binge Ad Skipper Chrome Extension. This open-source extension fast-forwards through ads, ensuring you enjoy your favourite content without any interruptions. Feel free to explore and contribute to the code on GitHub: (https://github.com/Russell0014/Binge-Ad-Auto-Skip).
